title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: Which cryptocurrency is the best to invest in right now and will explode following the bear market?

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on June 06, 2022, 12:19:33 PMWhich cryptocurrency is the best to invest in right now and will explode following the bear market? Bitcoin, without a doubt.If you follow the previous charts, every year the only coin that recovers and goes even bigger is bitcoin. No other altcoin can compare as much as bitcoin. It has been time-tested through bear markets and hence the only coin that people should invest in for the future.Beyond bitcoin, altcoins might recover, but dont get too excited about them, because most of them have a shaky foundation and only few are actually good enough to be in the competition.

comments.body: Quote from: TheUltraElite on June 06, 2022, 01:16:20 PMQuote from: Robert518 on June 06, 2022, 12:19:33 PMWhich cryptocurrency is the best to invest in right now and will explode following the bear market? Bitcoin, without a doubt.That's very reassuring, hopefully the cycle will continue to repeat in the next halving period. I also choose BTC if I have more funds to invest. In addition I have two other altcoin options such as ETH and BNB. I think they are the altcoins that are most able to survive when the market is bearish at the moment. Even though BNB still look new I think they are strong. Where as ETH I've witnessed from btc, ETH is the most survivable altcoin to date. This is not an investment suggestion, but I chose the 3 coins above. For other coins I think short term would be safer.
